lines_and_colors: As if I asked a common Alms and in my wondering Hand
A stranger pressed a Kingdom, and I bewildered stand,
As if I asked the Orient had it for me a Morn,
And it should lift it's Purple Dikes, and shatter me with Dawn -
document.title: As if I asked a common alms
document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
